AT.name: MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON
AT.description: Hilf Goemon und seinen Freunden Ebisumaru und Sasuke dabei, das alte Japan aus dem Klammergriff der bösen Black Ship Gang zu befreien und ihre Ninja-Gefährtin Yae zu retten! MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON ist ein Action-Rollenspiel, in dem du einen von drei Charakteren steuerst, die jeweils über einzigartige Fähigkeiten verfügen. Besuche Städte und befrage die Bewohner, um Hinweise zu erhalten. Kaufe Items, die dir auf deiner Mission weiterhelfen, und löse knifflige Rätsel, um Yae ausfindig zu machen und die Piraten zu besiegen.

CH.name: MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON
CH.description: Hilf Goemon und seinen Freunden Ebisumaru und Sasuke dabei, das alte Japan aus dem Klammergriff der bösen Black Ship Gang zu befreien und ihre Ninja-Gefährtin Yae zu retten! MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON ist ein Action-Rollenspiel, in dem du einen von drei Charakteren steuerst, die jeweils über einzigartige Fähigkeiten verfügen. Besuche Städte und befrage die Bewohner, um Hinweise zu erhalten. Kaufe Items, die dir auf deiner Mission weiterhelfen, und löse knifflige Rätsel, um Yae ausfindig zu machen und die Piraten zu besiegen.

ES.name: MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON
ES.description: ¡Lucha codo con codo junto a Goemon y sus amigos Ebisumaru y Sasuke para rescatar a Yae, su compañera ninja, y salva el antiguo Japón de las garras de la malvada Banda del Barco Negro! MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON, es un RPG de acción en el que podrás controlar a tres personajes diferentes con distintas habilidades. Explora ciudades, hablando con sus habitantes, compra objetos para avanzar en tu aventura y resuelve puzles para encontrar a Yae y vencer a los piratas.

BG.name: MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON
BG.description: Join Goemon and his friends Ebisumaru and Sasuke as they battle to save ancient Japan from the clutches of the evil Black Ship Gang, and rescue their fellow ninja Yae from the gang's clutches! MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON is an action role-playing game featuring three different characters to control, each with unique skills. Visit towns and question the inhabitants for clues, buy items to aid your quest, and solve brain-teasing puzzles to seek out Yae and defeat the pirates.

MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON is an action role-playing game featuring three different characters to control, each with unique skills. BE.name: MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON
BE.description: Rejoignez Goemon et ses frères d'armes Ebisumaru et Sasuke pour sauver leur amie Yae du Gang du vaisseau noir, et empêchez ces pirates de semer la terreur dans le japon féodal ! MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON est un jeu de rôle et d'action où vous pourrez contrôler trois personnages aux capacités différentes. Visitez des villes et interrogez leurs habitants pour obtenir des indices, achetez des objets pour avancer dans votre quête, et résolvez des casse-tête pour retrouver cette chère Yae et triompher des pirates !

IT.name: MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON
IT.description: Unisciti a Goemon e ai suoi amici Ebisumaru e Sasuke per combattere i malviventi della Banda della Nave Nera. Salva le sorti dell'antico Giappone e libera la tua amica Yae! MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON è un GdR d'azione in cui vestirai i panni di tre ninja, ciascuno con delle abilità uniche. In questo gioco visiterai numerosi villaggi in cui potrai chiedere informazioni agli abitanti. Inoltre, potrai acquistare oggetti utili alla tua ricerca e risolvere ingegnosi rompicapi. Parti all'avventura per sconfiggere i pirati e salvare Yae!

MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON is an action role-playing game featuring three different characters to control, each with unique skills. PT.name: MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON
PT.description: Junta-te a Goemon e aos seus amigos Ebisumaru e Sasuke na sua batalha para salvar o Japão Antigo das garras do maléfico Black Ship Gang e salva o seu amiga ninja Yae! MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON é um jogo de ação RPG onde podes controlar três personagens diferentes, cada uma com as suas capacidades únicas. Visita cidades e questiona os habitantes de modo a obter pistas, compra itens que te auxiliem na tua expedição e resolve puzzles desafiantes para encontrares Yae e derrotares os piratas.

PL.name: MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON
PL.description: Join Goemon and his friends Ebisumaru and Sasuke as they battle to save ancient Japan from the clutches of the evil Black Ship Gang, and rescue their fellow ninja Yae from the gang's clutches! MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON is an action role-playing game featuring three different characters to control, each with unique skills. Visit towns and question the inhabitants for clues, buy items to aid your quest, and solve brain-teasing puzzles to seek out Yae and defeat the pirates.

RU.name: MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON
RU.description: Пираты из шайки Black Ship Gang держат Японию в страхе, и только Goemon при помощи верных друзей Ebisumaru и Sasuke может справиться со злодеями и освободить ниндзя Yae из плена! MYSTICAL NINJA – ролевой экшн, в котором, помимо главного персонажа GOEMON, есть еще два героя с уникальными способностями. Путешествуйте по древней Японии, беседуйте с местными жителями, чтобы получить ценные сведения, покупайте предметы, необходимые для выполнения заданий, и решайте головоломки. Освободите Yae и избавьте страну от пиратской угрозы!

MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON is an action role-playing game featuring three different characters to control, each with unique skills. NL.name: MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON
NL.description: Sla de handen ineen met Goemon en zijn vrienden Ebisumaru en Sasuke die de strijd zijn aangegaan met de boosaardige Black Ship Gang om zowel het oude Japan als hun mede-ninja Yae uit de greep van deze bende te redden. MYSTICAL NINJA met in de hoofdrol GOEMON is een actie-RPG spel waarin je drie verschillende personages kunt besturen die elk unieke eigenschappen bezitten. Bezoek stadjes om aanwijzingen los te krijgen van de inwoners, koop voorwerpen die je kunnen helpen in je avontuur en los hersenkrakende puzzels op om Yae op het spoor te komen en de piraten te verslaan.

ZA.name: MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON
ZA.description: Join Goemon and his friends Ebisumaru and Sasuke as they battle to save ancient Japan from the clutches of the evil Black Ship Gang, and rescue their fellow ninja Yae from the gang's clutches! MYSTICAL NINJA starring GOEMON is an action role-playing game featuring three different characters to control, each with unique skills.
